dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who disturbs the shadows of the Twilight Forest? Speak, or face the wrath of the Lurking Horror!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It is I, Zarathos, the Dark Warlock. Bow before my power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one who has yet to prove their might. What do you seek in these accursed woods?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the dark artifacts hidden within. Tell me where they lie, or suffer!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare threaten me? Amusing, but futile. The artifacts remain with those strong enough to claim them.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall tear them from the shadows myself!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. Your arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We could join forces. I offer power in exchange for guidance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! What need have I for alliances? These woods are mine.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I only wish to traverse unnoticed. Allow me safe passage, and you shall be spared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spare me your mercy. You will find no peace here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face me, wraith! Let the dark magic decide our fate.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Prepare to be consumed by the shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I will find my own way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flee while you still can, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A wanderer, seeking power and knowledge. Will you aid me or hinder me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Aid? From the Lurking Horror? Your request is laughable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall take what I need by force.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You will find only death here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is something I can offer in return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have nothing I desire. Begone, before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me. I have powers that could be of great value.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough talk. Your presence tires me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, but remember this encounter when the shadows rise.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats are as empty as your soul.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, spirit. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace in the Twilight Forest? A fanciful notion. You amuse me, warlock.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer to avoid unnecessary conflicts. Do you not value your existence?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My existence is tied to the shadows. Conflict is inevitable here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If conflict is inevitable, then let us make a pact.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A pact with the Lurking Horror? Intriguing, yet pointless. I see no benefit.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a share in the power I shall wield.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tempting, but I trust you not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I have nothing more to say to you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Begone, then. Your presence is a nuisance.
